mapper.update: update employee set emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_age = #{empAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_income = #{empIncome,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emp_depart = #{empDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_position = #{empPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_name, emp_age, emp_income, emp_depart, emp_position from employee
